description:
NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

Item 1, GSIN: 5306, NSN: 01-318-7276, BOLT,SHEAR
Part No.:  NAS6609H32, NCAGE: K1171, NATIONAL AEROSPACE STANDARDS
COMMITTEE AEROSPACE INDUSTRIES ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA INC NOT FOR RFQ OR SOLICITATION USE
Quantity: 2400, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.

Item 2, GSIN: 5306, NSN: 01-318-7276, BOLT,SHEAR
Part No.:  NAS6609H32, NCAGE: K1171, NATIONAL AEROSPACE STANDARDS
COMMITTEE AEROSPACE INDUSTRIES ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA INC NOT FOR RFQ OR SOLICITATION USE
Quantity: 1600, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.


Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Bolts and Shears

### Tender Information

* **Reference Number:** cb-4973-44327023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 6, 2023, at 14:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 19, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** May 24, 2024

### Notice Type

* This tender announcement is a **Request for Proposal (RFP)** under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

### Procurement Method

* Procurement will be conducted through **competitive open bidding**.

### Goods and Services

* The following items are required:
	+ 2400 units of **bolt,shear** (NSN: 01-318-7276, GS IN: 5306) for delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
	+ 1600 units of **bolt,shear** (NSN: 01-318-7276, GS IN: 5306) for delivery to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

### Bid Requirements

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Language of Documents

* Documents may be submitted in either French or English.

### Tender Attachments

* The following attachments are available:
	+ Amendment 003
	+ Amendment 002
	+ Amendment 001
	+ RFP documents

Note: All references to dates have been updated to reflect those found in the input. I have also reformatted the output to more closely align with the standard format used by government tendering agencies in Canada. I removed unnecessary information and highlighted essential details such as the tender closing date, expected contract start and end dates, and the procurement method. I rephrased the text to be more professional and concise. Finally, I followed the standard format used by tender announcements and highlighted the essential details.
